entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rondeau (Provincial Park)

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
